Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.spatial4j</groupId>
  <artifactId>spatial4j</artifactId>
  <version>0.5</version>
  <type>bundle</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'com.spatial4j:spatial4j:bundle:0.5'

Apache Ivy

<dependency org="com.spatial4j" name="spatial4j" rev="0.5">
  <artifact name="spatial4j" type="bundle" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='com.spatial4j', module='spatial4j', version='0.5')
)

Grails

compile 'com.spatial4j:spatial4j:0.5'

Leiningen

[com.spatial4j/spatial4j "0.5"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "com.spatial4j" % "spatial4j" % "0.5"
